name: Teardrop Pendant - Gold
description: Elegant teardrop pendant with polished finish
svg_element: <path d="M0,-8 C-3,-8 -6,-5 -6,0 C-6,4 -3,8 0,8 C3,8 6,4 6,0 C6,-5 3,-8 0,-8 Z" fill="url(#goldGradient)" stroke="#B8860B" stroke-width="0.5"><defs><linearGradient id="goldGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%"><stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:#FFD700"/><stop offset="50%" style="stop-color:#FFA500"/><stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:#FF8C00"/></linearGradient></defs><animate attributeName="opacity" values="0.9;1;0.9" dur="4s" repeatCount="indefinite"/></path>

name: Diamond Pendant - White Gold
description: Classic diamond-shaped pendant with cubic zirconia center
svg_element: <g><path d="M0,-6 L-4,-2 L-2,6 L2,6 L4,-2 Z" fill="url(#whiteGoldGradient)" stroke="#C0C0C0" stroke-width="0.4"/><circle cx="0" cy="0" r="2" fill="#F0F8FF" stroke="#E0E6FF" stroke-width="0.3" opacity="0.9"/><circle cx="-0.5" cy="-0.5" r="0.5" fill="#FFFFFF" opacity="0.7"/><defs><linearGradient id="whiteGoldGradient"><stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:#F5F5F5"/><stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:#DCDCDC"/></linearGradient></defs><animate attributeName="opacity" values="0.9;1;0.9" dur="3s" repeatCount="indefinite"/></g>

name: Cross Pendant - Rose Gold
description: Delicate cross pendant with smooth finish
svg_element: <g fill="url(#roseGoldGradient)" stroke="#CD7F32" stroke-width="0.4"><rect x="-1" y="-6" width="2" height="12" rx="1"/><rect x="-4" y="-1" width="8" height="2" rx="1"/><defs><linearGradient id="roseGoldGradient"><stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:#E8B4B8"/><stop offset="50%" style="stop-color:#DDA0DD"/><stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:#CD7F32"/></linearGradient></defs></g>

name: Infinity Pendant - Silver
svg_element: <path d="M-6,0 C-6,-3 -3,-3 0,0 C3,3 6,3 6,0 C6,3 3,3 0,0 C-3,-3 -6,-3 -6,0 Z" fill="none" stroke="url(#silverGradient)" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linecap="round"><defs><linearGradient id="silverGradient"><stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:#E5E5E5"/><stop offset="50%" style="stop-color:#C0C0C0"/><stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:#A9A9A9"/></linearGradient></defs></path>

name: Hamsa Pendant - Gold
description: Traditional Hamsa hand pendant with turquoise accent
